Room.Name: Seaside Carnival Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing below snapping banners and flags, looking at the midway of the Seaside Carnival and Fair. A road to the beach is south of here.
Room.LongDescription: Excited humanoids of all races gaily pass by on their way to enjoy the sights and sounds that the fair has to offer. Pickpockets and cutpurses abound, as people's pockets overflow with gold. Hold on to your wallet! The midway lies to the west, while the main attraction is farther north.
